translations.ru: модальный глагол долженствования с отрицанием (не должен)

meaning_note: Used to say that it is necessary for something not to happen. To say that it is not necessary for something to happen, use ke zene.
conjugation_note: The -e- in zen(e)ke is elided, except if the ‹uy› or ‹ats› infixes are used (zen‹uy›eke, zen‹ats›eke).
